message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at the price of $18,000. I believe it holds significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is my bottom line. I'm willing to let it go for that price, otherwise, I'll have to explore other options.
